description: Returns the details of an instance of IAM Identity Center. The status can be one of the following:

parameters.name: InstanceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the instance of IAM Identity Center under which the operation will run.

nested_items.name: InstanceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the instance of IAM Identity Center under which the operation will run. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) and Amazon Web Services Service Namespaces in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

nested_items.name: IdentityStoreId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the identity store that is connected to the instance of IAM Identity Center.

nested_items.name: OwnerAccountId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Web Services account for which the instance was created.

nested_items.name: CreatedDate
nested_items.description: The date the instance was created.
